properties.address: Colehill Lane, Colehill, Dorset BH21 7AB
properties.description: Aimed at all ages We have run a community cafe for a good number of years and want to remind people that this is a place of welcome. Simple and nutritious hot and cold food is served each week, as well as cakes and hot drinks. Food is offered on a donations basis, so that cost does not have to be a barrier to those most in need.
properties.title: St Michael And All Angels Church Centre

properties.address: St Paul's Church Throop, Bournemouth, Dorset BH8 0NY
properties.description: St Paul's Cafe is a friendly, local church cafe in the heart of the Throop estate serving hot drinks, a selection of cakes and sweet treats, and bacon and egg rolls. There is a suggested donation to cover the costs of the food and drink, but it is not mandatory. There will also usually be members of the St Paul's ministry team around should you want someone to talk to. Come in and enjoy a warm space, a hot drink, and some warm company!
properties.title: St Paul's Cafe

properties.title: The Hope Hub

properties.address: The Hub Cafe @ Christ Church Creekmoor, Creekmoor, Dorset BH17 7XZ
properties.description: We're a safe, warm space for anyone who might need it, for any reason at all. The cafe is open for purchasing food and drink and we operate a PayItForward scheme so all food and drink is available for free if payment is an issue. Indoor children's play equipment is available, and all are welcome.
properties.title: The Hub @ Christ Church Creekmoor

properties.address: The Hub on the Heath, POOLE, Dorset BH17 8SA
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 30th October 2023** We are open on a Monday from 10am to 2pm to provide a warm welcome space for families and individuals of all ages, with free hot drinks and snacks. You can come just to sit somewhere safe and warm, join in a conversation or maybe play a board game. During our normal opening hours of 8.30am to 4.30pm Tuesday to Saturday, we are a cafe and community space open to all. You will always be greeted warmly and made to feel like part of The Hub family. We have children's toys, colouring and board games available to you whilst at The Hub. We also have a selection of free adult books available for you to take away, we just ask that you return it once you have finished reading it.
properties.title: The Hub on the Heath

properties.address: Victoria Park Methodist Church, Bournemouth, Dorset BH9 2QG
properties.description: We are a Community Cafe where all are welcome: all ages, all abilities, all genders, all faiths, all 'affordabilities'. We hold a 'pay-it-forward' board to help those who are going through tough times in our community. We sell delicious homemade cakes and light lunches. We have a children's corner with toys, books and crafts. We have been chosen as the Bournemouth Cafe of the Year 2023 and we couldn't be more grateful to our customers for the support!
properties.title: The Welcome Inn Cafe
